siteMetadata.name: HoJun Lee
siteMetadata.title: HoJun Lee | Embedded System / Firmware Engineer
siteMetadata.description: Embedde System and Firmware Engineer at Freshtech
siteMetadata.about: I'm a passionate maker who loves building things with my own hands. This passion led me to become an embedded systems engineer, where I write firmware and solder wires. Currently, I am working on a company project that utilizes ZephyrOS and nRF-based boards to develop a UWB system. In the future, I aim to enhance my skills in PCB design to become a well-rounded embedded systems developer

projects.name: U-Fresh (Current Project)
projects.description: A company project that develops a livestock monitoring system using UWB embedded ear tag. We are co-developing the system with Samsung LSI, using their Exynos Connect U100 UWB chip.

projects.name: Numerical Method Visualizer
projects.description: A web-app team project using react to visualize multiple numerical methods. On backend, I have used mathjax to create algorithm to calculate the interpolations including Simpson's Rule, Trapezoid Rule and Lagrange Polynomial Interpolations. On the frontend, I have created graphing methods for said formulas and the website footer.

projects.name: Harrys Tools
projects.description: An outsource project for Harry's Education. Harry's Education is a private education institution, or Hagwon(학원), which requires a heavy load of paper works to provide catered education for the students. I have created a personalized document automation tools on demand with python and hwp API.

projects.name: University class Projects
projects.description: and other number of class projects including "Diffusion model for enhancing CT images (Machine Learning, Python)", "0\1 Knapsack problem solver(Distributed system, C++)", "Bytetools Web Application(Outsource web-app, react)" and "Youtube trending video prediction model(Machine Learning, Python)"

experience.name: Freshtech
experience.description: Emebedded System / Firmware Engineer, January 2025 - Present

skills.name: Embedded System
skills.description: ZephyrOS, nRF52, STM32, ARM Cortex-M, C/C++, Assembly(AMD64), Linux, Rasbian, Arduino

skills.name: Web development
skills.description: Javascript(es6), Typesrcipt, React, Node.js, Next.js, jest, HTML, CSS
